ygData.subject: RE: Babbinsbort
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that he spawns by the big rock in the very back of the third level. Is that the same place you are talking about? I scoped it out this weekend
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard that he spawns by the big rock in the very back of the third
level. Is that the same place you are talking about? I scoped it out this
weekend while I was getting a Thex Mallet. There were 3 skels there, so I am
gonna go back this weekend and camp it. I have heard that his placeholder is
the one on the left of the three spawns. We'll see....

Drizben D'Vorn
Defiled High Priest of Innoruuk
Oblivion Knight of the 26th Circle


> From: Martyn Adams <martyn-adams@...>
>
> Has anyone else had much luck with Babbinsbort the gnome necro in
> Befallen.
>
> I have been killing his placeholder ever 6-9 hours semi regulary (I
> reckon I get 2 out of the 3 spawns a day) for over a week and a bit
> now.. but all I've been getting are plague rats, large skeletons and
> giant rats. I'm pretty sure I'm hunting in the right place. It's in
> the room next to the DE SK (the left DE SK if you are facing as if you
> have just come through the wooden door opposite the hidden wall in the
> corridor) This spawn only spawns 3 times a day or so anyway so it's
> sommat special.
>
> Is there anything else I should be doing to trigger his spawn or am I
> just being very unlucky and who ever gets the other spawn each day is
> getting Babbinsbort? Did people clear out the level just before he was
> supposed to spawn? clear out the room? kill Gynok? kill Cmdr
> Windstream? any ideas on triggers people cos this is driving me mad. :)
>
> And why are all our quests in zones where there is nothing else close to
> our level to hunt.. I wouldn't mind camping stuff if we could at least
> get xp while we were doing it.. oh well.. this is turning out to be more
> of a pain than the paw of opella was..
>
> Vinamin
> Son of Innoruuk
> Priest of The Lady
> Erollisi Marr
>
